block.p: Manhattan
CHELSEA

$1.39 million 300 West 23rd Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 850-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen; renovated kitchen, north and east exposures; wraparound terrace; laundry in building; maintenance $2,093, 58% tax deductible; listed at $1.45 million, 8 weeks on market (broker: Halstead Property)

WEST MIDTOWN $800,000 100 West 57th Street (Carnegie House) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,280-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge; windowed kitchen, renovated bath, 3 exposures; laundry in building; maintenance $1,888, 27% tax deductible; listed at $899,000, 41 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)
WEST SIDE

$999,000 1965 Broadway (66th Street) (Grand Millennium) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 820-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge; renovated kitchen; common charge $508; taxes $6,948; listed at $1.09 million, 24 weeks on market (brokers: Sotheby's International Realty; Bellmarc Realty)
UPPER WEST SIDE

$1.225 million 23 West 73rd Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,150-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen; renovated kitchen and baths, 3 exposures; gym in building; maintenance $1,894, 58% tax deductible; listed at $1.225 million, 13 weeks on market (brokers: Corcoran Group; Klara Madlin Real Estate)
HUDSON HEIGHTS

$407,500 900 West 190th Street (Cabrini Terrace) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 688-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen; Hudson River view; maintenance $558, 42% tax deductible; listed at $415,000, 5 weeks on market (broker: Simone Song Properties)
Bronx

RIVERDALE $830,000 2521 Palisade Avenue (La Rive) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,250-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen; dining room, renovated kitchen and marble baths, whirlpool tub, laundry; terrace; pool in complex; common charge $1,450; taxes $7,000; listed at $850,000, 36 weeks on market (brokers: Halstead Property)
Brooklyn

BOERUM HILL $1.85 million 242 Bergen Street 2-family, 4-story brownstone; 6 bedrooms, 1 1/2 baths, dining room, double parlor with decorative mantles in primary unit; 2 bedrooms, 2 baths in other unit; high ceilings, wide-plank hardwood floors, original moldings and detail in each; 20-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,799; listed at $1.995 million, 3 weeks on market (broker: Nancy McKiernan Realty)

CARROLL GARDENS $469,000 529 Court Street (The Terraces) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 720-sq.-ft. condo in a newly constructed building; concierge; kitchen with stainless steel appliances, marble bath, 2 exposures; terrace; common roof deck in building; common charge $293, 100% tax-abated; listed at $469,000, 2 weeks on market (broker: Brooklyn Properties of 7th Avenue)
Queens

BEECHHURST $730,000 154-60 10th Avenue 3-bedroom, 3-bath, 97-year-old stucco-sided house; dining area, renovated eat-in kitchen with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances, renovated baths, finished basement; 34-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,569; listed at $769,000, 14 weeks on market (broker: PCA Realty)
FRESH MEADOWS

$615,000 75-26 189th Street 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 67-year-old brick- and aluminum-sided side-hall colonial-style house; dining room, eat-in kitchen with upgraded appliances, living room with fireplace, enclosed porch, new windows; 2-car garage; 40-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $4,086; listed at $649,900, 17 weeks on market (broker: Goller & Costi Realty)
California

LAFAYETTE $1.625 million 3455 Stage Coach Drive 4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 19-year-old 1-story brick- and wood-sided house; in-ground pool, 3-car garage; 0.47-acre lot; taxes $18,525; listed at $1.745 million, 3 weeks on market (brokers: Intero Real Estate; Coldwell Banker Residential Brokerage)
SAN FRANCISCO

$599,000 153 Majestic Avenue 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 98-year-old 1-story semiattached stucco-sided house; ocean view; 1-car garage; 37-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $6,829; listed at $599,000, 7 weeks on market (broker: Century 21 Hartford Properties)

SAN FRANCISCO $907,000 11 Wright Street 2-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 100-year-old 2-story wood-sided house; living room with fireplace, family room, renovated baths, high ceilings; rear patio with hot tub; 1-car garage; 25-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $10,340; listed at $879,000 (multiple bids), 5 weeks on market (broker: Century 21 Hartford Properties)

SAN FRANCISCO $1.55 million 8027-8029 Geary Boulevard 5-bedroom, 4-bath, legal 2-family, 77-year-old semiattached house being used as a 1-family residence; dining room, eat-in kitchen with island and pantry, ocean view; 35-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $17,690; listed at $1,499,950 (multiple bids), 5 weeks on market (broker: Century 21 Hartford Properties)
WALNUT CREEK

$329,000 1840 Tice Creek Drive (Waterfords) 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 920-sq.-ft. condo in a 16-year-old building; dining area, living room, wall-to-wall carpets; pool, clubhouse and tennis courts in complex; common charge $1,490; taxes $3,751; listed at $339,000, 12 weeks on market (broker: Coldwell Banker Residential Brokerage)
Manhattan
